summary: This bill, the 'Protect Small Businesses from Excessive Paperwork Act of 2025,' proposes to amend Title 31 of the United States Code concerning the deadline for filing beneficial ownership information reports. Specifically, it seeks to modify the filing deadline for reporting companies formed or registered before January 1, 2024, extending it to January 1, 2026. This aims to ease potential burdens on small businesses related to compliance requirements.
